data.short_description: 'The Island: In To The Mist' is an adventure game. It includes basic features of adventure genre and add some new systems to interest you. You have been given a chance to experience a group of university students, who confined in the island. There is a terrific but interesting story you will see.
data.supported_languages:
Korean*, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10
  • Processor: 1.0 Ghz Processor or Higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB or Higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
